column1: | online obituaries for the indianapolis in area. james robinson. june 10
column2: 2015 in loving memory of james robinson will be posted as soon as it is available. funeral information. services are to take place wednesday june 17th 2015 at crown hill's memorial chapel. visitation is from 10:00 am to 12:00 pm with the service to follow at 12:00 pm. burial will be at new crown cemetery. light a special candle. send a heart of condolence.
